title: Sketchbook Folio, "The Virgin and Child, on Clouds, Supported by Four Putti, Study after Guglielmo della Porta", 1821–22
medium: Pen and brown ink, brown wash, over black chalk on white heavy wove paper
inscribed: in pen and brown ink at lower left: 7, Gulielmo della Porta Roma
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Above, Virgin with standing child, in what seems to be niche with bands of decoration on arch; clouds at center divide composition supported by four putti below, resembling caryatids.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "The Virgin and Child, on Clouds, Supported by Four Putti, Study after Guglielmo della Porta", 1821–22.
1821–22. Pen and brown ink, brown wash, over black chalk on white heavy wove paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3554-1.
